attributes.action: Allow Geert Wilder to enter the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On the 12th of February 2009, Geert Wilder was denied entry to the United Kingdom under order of the Home Secretary. This was done as it was "not conducive to the public good". This is, however, a breach of Mr. Wilder's rights as a citizen of the European Union. We believe that he must be allowed access to the U.K.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
